_xResult.title: 'Luna' Premium Wool Jacket
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made single breasted jacket in 20+ colors
_xResult.longdesc:
Working with top London tailor & couturier Lino Piani is not like any experience you've had before. For one thing, he's an expert in dressing the female body with creations that flatter and fit. Second, he approaches every commission with creative consultation to help you get precisely the outcome you want. If you have envied the highly personalized experiences that men get when they buy a top quality custom suit, you'll be delighted to know you can have this same experience no matter where you live. Lastly, his attention to detail and the finest fabrics mean this is an investment you'll treasure for years to come.

 

Dress like a royal, courtesy of a tailor who has dressed celebrities worldwide. Single breasted "Luna" jacket in Venitian wool evoking an 18th century military jacket with lapels that flat fasten by a hidden tab under the lapel. Pair this custom made women's jacket with the Piera pants for a polished set that will conquer nations. Tailored in England by experienced Saville Row tailors.

 

We love this custom made blazer for so many reasons: the light tailored structure at front, slim fit with crossed flap pockets and diagonal fastened cuffs. Includes lightly padded shoulder and dyed to match lining with a choice of contrast sleeve linings. Highest quality wool fabric is multi-season and crafted to last.

  • Available in over 20 colors - see color card, include your choice in checkout notes
  • Horn button fastening at front and cuffs
  • 100% wool, lining: 60% acetate / 40% viscose satin
  • Dry clean only

 

New Customer Special! 15% off your Lino Piani order for all new customers!
